Blog.post: Just got home from work (3:40pm) i got a decent bit done there. Got half of the doves breast done. Hopefully will finish it later today or tomorrow. Will post later about it.

ok so its 3:12 am and i am just going on to bed. Just half of the dove filled in so should be pretty much done before bed tomorrow. Not sure tho tomorrow being laundry day. Well hopefully. But that will give me time to do it i guess if little one is behaving. ;) You have to love 2 year olds. Just kidding i wouldnt trade her for the world. Well its off to bed for me. Night guys.

My dove and rose that i am making for my mom is coming a long good. i got the entire rose done now. I finished it last night and today i got most of the outlining of the dove done. All that is left is filling in the dove, words, and backstitching. I hope to have it done either tomorrow or thursday. Went to the dollar tree here in town and found some small kits there!!!! since when can you get the kits for 1.00 i stocked up got 10 of them lol. One of each kind. so now i really have lots to work on.
this blog is going to be about my stitching that i am doing and things that are going on in my life. i hope you enjoy this.

Ok I have been told that i have not updated lately so here it is. I have not gotten much stitching done being that i have had a migraine all week. I am going to try to pick it up tomorrow. I will let you know how it goes.
Well im about half way done with this and its turning out great!!!! i stitched for about 5 hours today!!! totally lost track of time. hopefully be done in the next couple days. Ill let you know!!!!

Ok i didnt get much of this surprise done today but i did totally finish my first greeting card that i have ever made. it came out great. It was for a summer theme and i chose to do an ice cream cone!!!!! back to omni's gift tomorrow!
This is coming out cute.. its a lot of work but i think its going to come out great. I can't tell you what it is yet but ill let you know when i see what its going to look like. Shhhh its a secret :)

Ok i got it done. I didnt do the back stitching on it so it looks softer i should have a pic posted on webshots tomorrow on it. now i am off to do something very original for my friends baby that is due in Sept. She is naming the baby Omni so im doing something fun for her. Ill let you guys know how it goes!
urlLink Here is the wip so far. Almost done have not stitched in 2 days on it. i have the rest of the outer border and the personalization to do then its done hopefully tomorrow. urlLink

Well being that i have aggravated my pinched sciatic nerve in my back i have not been able to stitch a lot but i do have half of the border done. So all i have to do is the rest of the border and the personalization and the backstitching hope to get it done this weekend. We'll see how it goes. Talk to you later.

I got a lot of the border done today but still a lot to go. Hope to be done by the end of the week. I also have a card to make which will be my first one in the summer theme. Not sure what im going to make and im kinda nervous being that i am sending it to someone that i dont know yet. Everyone tells me my work is great but i dont think its "that" great. I have only been stitching for about 3 months so i have a lot to learn. But we'll see how that comes out. I also have to make Toya's baby stitch and hang for her baby shower on the 24th but that wont take long a day or day and a half at the most. Well Im off to bed for the night we'll see how tomorrow goes.
Got the ball done now and started on the border.... its coming out sooooooo cute. Have no idea how long it will take me to get hopefully by the end of the week!!!!

Its got a diaper and booties now... I did that last night it is coming out soooo cute. I did the dots on it and now working on its toys the beach ball is really cute. well heck the whole thing is cute. i hope my cousin likes it. After this I have to start working on baby shower presents and then christmas. Looks like i am going to be living in a world of x's for a long long time. But hey im not complaining its very relaxing. Well off to stitch some more i have the bug today and look forward to tomorrow as it is my only day off this week i can sit and stitch with no work interrupptions. yea!!!!!! talk to you later.

I got a lot done today on the work. The duck and bear have eyes and the teddy is almost done. the ducks head is done now just filling in the little things. I have to learn to do french knots for this project so that will be fun. I am going to post a wip pic tomorrow on my webshots account so go take a look.
ok i guess tonight wasnt my night to stitch. i spent more time frog'ing my thing more then stitching it. so ill pick it up tomorrow. going to bed need to sleep sometime.
I didnt get much stitching done in the last 2 days but am working on it now and it is coming out great. It is going to be sooooo cute. well back to stitching some more ttyl

This is going to be fun. I worked a little on it today but didnt get much done being I took Lexi (my 2 1/2 yo dd) and my 6 year old neice to the beach for the day and then stayed for the fireworks. Came home wanting to work on it but I am way to tired after looking after them. Ill get some done tomorrow at work and then i can work on it tomorrow when i get home and as always i'll keep you posted. Oh yea there is a pic for the finished dove and rose on my webshots account now go take a look and let me know what you think.

Guess what guys!!!! I'm done with the dove and the rose finally! Ill post pics for you guys tomorrow. Im going to start on my cousin's baby's birth announcement. It's suzy's zoo little whitzyy birth announcement. So off to work on some fun things. Ill keep you updated.
ok guys this is almost done just have the words to do now that will def. be done tomorrow and will be posted on webshots. Its 3 am so im going to bed.
nightyly cap of the dove and rose. I got all of the dove done now all i have to do is backstitching that will be done tomorrow i promise then ill post the link for the pic.
didnt get much done today going to stitch while dh is watching wrestling lol. will let you guys know just have the wings and backstitch to do.

well i didnt get much done today being that my shoulder is bothering me. i have tendonitis and bursitis in the right shoulder. and after rearranging my living room last night i aggravated my sciatic (sp?) nerve in my back.. its pinched. But i did get most of the dove filled in. Now its just the wings and the backstitching and words to do hopefully tomorrow will be that day i have nothing better to do then sit here and wait for the satallite guy anyways lol. I had my first expierence with half stitches last night and let me tell you they are NOT my favorite lol but guess ill get use to it. well i am off to bed for the night. see you all tomorrow.
